name: StatePodAutomatism
0:
”Alexa, open state pod automatism”
”Alexa, start state pod automatism”
”Alexa, launch state pod automatism”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state pod automatism
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number." 
Play an interactive Infotainment on Art Therapy for Wilderness Therapy on the theme of restoring rivers. Restoring Rivers is the second episode of art therapy, as part of Wilderness Therapy of Vayu Vaidya, in this episode we present sample pieces of art, created by the author to demonstrate a new analysis of the autopilot thinking stemming from Freudian and Jungian surrealism, from the bardos of the subconscious and dream automation, an analysis of the creative sub-processes of surrealist automation, surfacing of the subconscious, in the use of art therapy in diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment, we present a summary of the infotainment on the naturalness of the therapy and the understanding of the nature of the autopilot in states and in pods. A way of transcendence to a simultaneous moment of interconnected pods as states of abstractionism denoting a depth in the conscious psyche.
You can browse Vayu Vaidya Infotainment at https://vayuvaidya.weebly.com
You can say "stop" anywhere in the skill to exit the skill at any time, saying "help" provides a help menu and "loop off" restarts the skill.
priv:
